name: Head Only 接头霸王 Pose
description:
__________________________________________________________________________

This is not required, but if you like the content I made, please consider tipping or commissioning on my ko-fi page: https://ko-fi.com/jackyg16

__________________________________________________________________________

Perfect for museum exhibition materials or headshots for Photoshop

完美适用于制作博物馆展品以及精修美妆照

接头霸王 岂不美哉
